resources.string:
Start by entering a principle amount in the principle field. A valid input can only consist of a non-negative number. 
 
Next, enter an interest rate. A valid input can only consist of a non-negative number. 
 
Finally, enter an amortization period in terms of years. A valid input can only consist of a non-negative, non-decimal number. 
 
The application will generate your monthly mortgage payment on the following summary page after tapping the calculate button. 
 
The currency and interest payment frequency can be changed in the settings page on the main menu.

Your mortgage payment was calculated using the following formula, where: 
r is the interest rate based on the selected payment frequency. 
 
n is the amortization period in years, multiplied by the selected payment frequency. 
 
P is the initial principle amount. 
 
M is the final mortgage payment you pay based on the interest and amortization period.
